column2: ALPHA BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. WE HAVE THE BASE. I REPEAT WE HAVE CAPTURED THE BASE. OVER.
ALPHA TO PAPA BEAR. INTERSECTION HAS BEEN SEIZED. OVER.
ALPHA BLACK TO ALL FORCES. GO GO GO, ASSAULT IS GO. OVER.
BRAVO BLACK TO ALPHA BLACK. WE HAVE SEIZED THE NORTHERN INTERSECTION. OVER.
BRAVO TO ALPHA. READY TO ATTACK THE MAIN BASE. WAITING FOR YOUR CALL. OVER.
CHARLIE TO ALPHA. STANDING BY TO ATTACK. JUST SAY THE WORD. OVER.
FOXTROT BLACK TO ALPHA BLACK. WE ARE READY TO ASSAULT. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA BLACK. ROGER. PROCEED WITH THE MISSION. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA. COPY THAT GOOD JOB. MISSION ACCOMPLISHED. PAPA BEAR OUT.
